Game.Name: Busou Keiji - Cyber Cross (Japan)
Game.plot: Based on one of those live action (late '70's early '80) Japanese television shows. You are some guy who powers up to become a super hero (although the transformation is hysterically funny becuase it's outright tacky). Anyway, there are three armors available, and each one has two power levels.Graphics are colorful but one layer, showing absolutely no field of depth. It is a hard game with no continues and no extra lives. So you have to finish the game with one tiny health bar with very few chances to replenish it. Forgot the company that released it. [bt: released by Face -- the same company that did Time Cruise]http://baetzler.de/vidgames/Hu-reviews.varCheat: Continue TwiceAt the game over screen, hold Down + I + II and press Run two times.
Game.Notes: Rolling Thunder-esque platform beat 'em up which gives you the ability to transform into a brightly coloured Power Suit as you fight crime on the streets.
